## Here's exactly how we price your drugs
We think you should know how much your medications cost and why. For example, a**30 count supply of 400mg Imatinib** will cost:

#### $0.00
You save **$0.00** on your medication

Your final cost will include shipping and taxes, which vary by location.

## FAQs
We've got answers.
What is the Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company?
Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company (more commonly known as Cost Plus Drugs) offers safe medicines at the lowest possible price. We provide complete transparency on the cost of drugs so that patients know they are getting a fair price. As a public-benefit corporation, we prioritize our social mission of improving public health. To learn more about our mission, check out [costplusdrugs.com/mission](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/</mission/>).
How does Cost Plus Drugs work?
  1. Find your medication in our online store by searching, browsing alphabetically or by medical condition.
  2. Once you’ve found your medication, [sign up for an account](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/</create-account/>).
  3. Reach out to your doctor or provider with our provided instructions ([costplusdrugs.com/contact-your-doctor](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/</contact-your-doctor/>)) to receive your prescriptions.
  4. Once we receive a prescription from your doctor, you’ll be notified to checkout.
  5. Your medications will be delivered straight to your door in just a few days.


How are your prices so cheap?
Our prices are the true cost to get each medication from the manufacturer to you. We cut out the pharmacy middlemen and negotiate directly with manufacturers to get the best possible price. Then, we show you exactly how much you’ll pay for us to keep our business running and how much it will cost to prepare and ship your prescription.
Can I use my insurance?
Currently, we only accept prescription insurance for the following insurance providers. However, we will be adding more insurance plans in the coming months. If you aren’t sure if Cost Plus Drugs accepts your insurance, please contact your insurance company and ask if Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company is an “in-network pharmacy" with your prescription plan.
AffirmedRx, Archimedes, Capital Blue Cross, Drexi, FairosRx, Liviniti, MedOne, Network Health Plan, Oread Rx, PCA Rx, PharmPix, Rightway, RxPreferred, Scripius, SelectHealth, SGRX, SmithRx, TransparentRx, True Rx Health Strategists, TrueScripts, VIVIO, WellDyne, and other select prescription plans.
My provider sent me here. What do I do next?
Just sign up for an account and the prescription from your doctor will be connected to your account. Then, our pharmacy partner will notify you when you’re ready to checkout and get your medications delivered.
Does Mark Cuban really own this company?
Yes! Investor Mark Cuban and CEO Dr. Alexander Oshmyansky strongly believe that every American should have access to safe, affordable medicines. Many Americans are spending crazy amounts of money each month just to stay healthy. We know there’s a better way. We work with HealthDyne, our trusted fulfillment partner to fill your prescriptions from their accredited pharmacies. HealthDyne's licensed pharmacists will ensure your medication is safely dispensed and shipped to you, and they are available 24/7 for consultations or questions about your medication. To learn more about our mission and how Mark Cuban has been involved, check out [Our Mission](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/</mission/>).
Who fills my prescription?
We work with HealthDyne, our trusted fulfillment partner to fill your prescriptions. HealthDyne's accredited pharmacists will ensure your medication is safe and delivered to your doorstep on time.
Can I get all my medications here?
For now, we only offer a set amount of medications. To see all medications we currently offer, please go to [costplusdrugs.com/medications](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/</medications/>). We will be expanding this list regularly so if you don't see your medication, please sign up for our [newsletter](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/<https:/cdn.forms-content.sg-form.com/ef7874cc-d536-11ec-9148-7a345e6fe361>) to be updated when we add new medications.
View all FAQs
Looking for our corporate site? [Click here](http://www.costplusdrugs.com/<https:/www.markcubancostplusdrugcompany.com/>)

generated_description:
**Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company, PBC: An Overview**

The Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company (often shortened to Cost Plus Drugs) is on a mission to revolutionize access to medications by making high-cost generic drugs affordable. Founded by billionaire entrepreneur Mark Cuban, this online pharmacy aims to eliminate the price-markup tactics of traditional pharmacies by operating transparently and directly with manufacturers.

### Mission and Operations

Cost Plus Drugs is focused on creating low-cost versions of expensive generic drugs. The company operates through its website, [costplusdrugs.com](http://www.costplusdrugs.com), where it lists hundreds of medications, many of which are essential for managing chronic conditions and improving overall health. The goal is simple: “Everyone should have safe, affordable medicines with transparent prices,” Cuban emphasizes. 

### How It Works

Here's how it works:

1. **Find Your Medication**: Patients can browse or search for their required medication on the website.
2. **Get a Prescription**: Users must reach out to their healthcare providers to send prescriptions directly to Cost Plus Drugs.
3. **Receive Your Medications**: Once received, prescriptions are processed, and medications are shipped to the customer's home.

By negotiating directly with manufacturers, Cost Plus Drugs can offer medications at prices significantly lower than retail rates. For example, Abiraterone Acetate, a generic for Zytiga, costs $23.69 on their site compared to a retail price of $1,093.20. This kind of savings speaks volumes about the company's commitment to affordability.

### Transparency in Pricing

The company prides itself on its transparent pricing model, which breaks down costs for customers so they can understand exactly what they’re paying for. There are no hidden markups, and patients can see a clear cost structure including manufacturer prices, a small markup, and shipping fees.

### A Public Benefit Corporation

Cost Plus Drugs is structured as a public-benefit corporation (PBC). This means it has a social mission at its core—a commitment to improving public health and making sure more people can afford their medication without going bankrupt. Cuban’s involvement adds significant visibility, as he is well-known for challenging the status quo in various industries.

### Headlines and Impact

Since its inception, the company has made waves in the press, highlighting the struggle many Americans face regarding prescription drug prices. It stands at the intersection of healthcare and e-commerce, and has been noted as a potential solution in government discussions about lowering drug costs on a national scale.

### Conclusion

The Mark Cuban Cost Plus Drug Company, PBC is a disruptive force in the pharmaceutical industry, challenging traditional pricing models and advocating for transparent pricing. By directly connecting consumers with high-quality, low-cost medications, it embodies a significant shift in how people can access essential health products. In a time when healthcare costs are spiraling, the company’s mission couldn't be more crucial.
